name: Sprite Wars
description:
Sprite Wars is a top-down arena shooter roguelite. Use, develop and purchase any of 8 unique weapons and 4 different skills. Fight bosses and show your enemies who the real boss is at the end of 40 levels.


  • 8 unique weapons and 4 different skills
  • Variety of enemies and bosses
  • Choose weapons, upgrade skills, unlock masteries
  • Bonus objectives for more rewards!
  • Long playing time and challenging levels
  • Auto save system
  • Cute graphics and colourful atmosphere
